main event: A strange object of green-blue light, similar to a mercury vapor lamp, was observed slowly rotating on top of a 50-foot tower in Lincoln Park, Michigan on August 27 from 9:50 PM to 10:30 PM.
interesting points: The object was about 50 feet above the ground, approximately 200 feet from some trees.
The object made very little sound as it slowly rotated on the tower.
The object disappeared from sight very quickly, in 15-20 seconds.
The sighting occurred in Lincoln Park, Michigan.
The report is from Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program that investigated UFOs from 1952 to 1969.
sighted object: a strange object of green-blue light, similar to a mercury vapor lamp
